title: Dr Moeed expresses concerns over deteriorating economic situation in Afghanistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 18 (APP):National Security Adviser Dr Moeed Yusuf on Monday expressed concerns over the deteriorating economic situation in Afghanistan during a call on paid by US Charge d’Affaires Angela Aggeler.
During the meeting, bilateral relations between Pakistan-US and Afghanistan were discussed between the two officials, said a news release.
Both the sides determined to move forward together on the issue of Afghanistan.US Charge d’Affaires appreciated Pakistan’s assistance and efforts regarding evacuation in Afghanistan.
